title: LightSourceSettings
description: This element holds the Setting applied to a Light Source used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference to the LightSource (the ID attribute) in question.

subCategoriesOrder.LightSourceSettings: This element holds the Setting applied to a Light Source used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference to the LightSource (the ID attribute) in question.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

IlluminationPowerSettings.description: This field records the nominal Illumination Power (also known as Power Output or Illumination Intensity) that was set for the Acquisition of this Image or was reported by the Image Acquisition Software, as advertised by the Manufacturer. Depending on the system this might be reported as a % value.

Attenuation.description: This field records the actual Attenuation of the excitation light power that was applied during the Acquisition of this Channel, expressed as a fractional value from 0.0 to 1.0.

AttenuationMethod.description: This field records the Method that was used to Attenuate the Laser beam during the acquisition of this Image.

UsedAcoustoOpticalDevice.description: In case a Laser was used for this Image Acquisition, this field records whether (True) or not (False) an AcoustoOptical Device was employed for intensity modulation.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
